ItemRemovalDialog.info: You are about to do a potentially destructive action. Are you sure you want to proceed?

FormIdentificationType.label: Visual identification outside of the app context
FormIdentificationType.info: Each organizational unit has its Visual Identification. Organizational units serve as origin, where every component has to came from. When the component is placed outside of its its origin, it shows the Visual Identification of the origin â€“ a colored stripe and a square icon displayed on the left in the header. Icon allows access to the local navigation of its origin.

FormBaseUri.label: Base URI of the app
FormBaseUri.message: URL of the app from which to load context, data and visual identification.

FormUu5Id.label: User preference ID
FormUu5Id.message: Unique identification for storing and loading preferences for this component.

FormOid.label: Object ID
FormOid.message: Identification of a specific object the component should display.

FormBid.label: Branch ID
FormBid.message: Identification of a specific branch from uuBranchKit.

FormRts.label: Show data for a specific date

FormClassName.label: CSS classes
FormClassName.message: Separate the names with a space.

FormStyle.label: CSS styles
FormStyle.message: Write between the brackets. Each style to a single line ended with a semicolon.
FormStyle.error: The only valid selector is the component.

FormCard.label: Display the component as a card

FormFullTextSearchPriority.label: Full text search priority
FormFullTextSearchPriority.message: Setting the preferred component search. Auto is undefined priority of the component. 0 means that the component and its children will not be indexed by fullTextSearch. 1 means the lowest priority and 5 means the highest priority.

FormSpaces.info: Spacing is automatically responsive using values from uuGDS adaptive spacing palette.
FormSpaces.infoForMargin: The margin values are adjusted according to the nesting level of the component. If the nesting level is set to 'area' or 'areaCollection', the values defined for ${horizontal} will not be passed to the component. If the nesting level is set to 'inline', the values defined for ${vertical} will not be passed to the component.
FormSpaces.dialogInfo: All set values will be reseted.

FormUnit.error: The value is not valid. Check the units.

FormAuthorization.typeMsg: Only the selected authorization type is appllied.
FormAuthorization.artifactUriMsg: To select 'Allowed profiles' or 'Use case' it is necessary to fill in 'Artifact URI.
FormAuthorization.uuTerritoryBaseUriError: This is not a valid URI.
FormAuthorization.roleGroupIdListMsg: 'Territory URI' must be filled in first
FormAuthorization.useCaseMsg: A user is authorized if user is occupied in at least one profile that the use case can execute.
FormAuthorization.profileListError: Failed to load profiles from given Artifact URI. You can select from the default profile set or enter a custom profile name.
